name: qodana-code
description: Integrates linter execution results from Qodana Cloud into VS Code.
author: JetBrains s.r.o.

qodana.projectId.description: Project ID from Qodana Cloud project URL (URLs have following format https://qodana.cloud/projects/PROJECT_ID/reports/REPORT_ID).

qodana.pathPrefix.markdownDescription: Path prefix to locate files from report. Change only if there are no issues displayed. For more details, refer to extension description.

walkthroughs.title: Get started with Qodana
walkthroughs.description: Step-by-step guide to configuring extension to deliver results from Qodana Cloud into VS Code

steps.title: Check that Java is installed
steps.description: Qodana requires Java 11 or higher to be installed and available in $PATH.

steps.title: Make sure you have a project in Qodana Cloud
steps.description: Go to [Qodana Cloud](https://qodana.cloud), create a project for your repository if one does not already exist.

steps.title: Open issue to connect to project in Qodana Cloud
steps.description:
Clicking "Open in VSCode" under any problem in report in Qodana Cloud. 
 You can do it manually as well [Open Settings](command:workbench.action.openWorkspaceSettings?%22@ext:jetbrains.qodana%22)

media.altText: Open issue to connect to project in Qodana Cloud

steps.title: Make sure that at least one report was created
steps.description: Run Qodana analysis. It can be executed either locally using Qodana CLI or through CI/CD pipelines.

steps.title: Open your project source code in VSCode
steps.description: Open code of your project as a folder in VSCode.

steps.title: See report
steps.description: You can see analysis report in Problems panel (View - Problems).

steps.title: Adjust path prefix
steps.description:
If you see no issues from report, you may need to adjust path prefix. 
 See extension decription for details. 
 [Open Settings](command:workbench.action.openWorkspaceSettings?%22@ext:jetbrains.qodana%22)

steps.title: Turn Qodana on/off
steps.description: You can turn Qodana integration on or off for current Workspace by clicking on Qodana icon in status bar.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
